EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Powering Enterprise Transformation with Cloud and Data Seminar_KY_
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Invited: Strategies for Digital Transformation - Seminar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/strategies-for-digital-transformation/louisville> Every business is becoming digital. Digital disruption is causing companies to act faster to bring new innovative services to market. We can no longer rely on obsolete methods to retain and attain customers and expand market reach. Companies must embrace digital disruption to thrive in this fast-changing and competitive landscape.
Join us for a half-day seminar at the Louisville Marriott Downtown to learn more about modern technology capabilities needed to become a digital business and imperatives that the successful digital disrupters embrace. THURSDAY
May 21, 2015
8:30 AM - 1:00 PM
Louisville Marriott Downtown
280 W. Jefferson Street
Louisville, KY REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/strategies-for-digital-transformation/louisville>
